paragraphs.text: Thank you. This is a really beautifully written tribute to your friend. I am so sorry for your loss.
paragraphs.name: 22c0

paragraphs.text: Zach —Thank you for sharing your thoughts/feelings in this post. I am sorry for your loss (after all these years). I wanted to share a tid-bit- I have a 10 year old daughter. Her is name is Liv. She is named after one of the victims — Liviu Librescu — who died protecting his students at VT. We never met him but we chose to honour him due to his act…
paragraphs.name: 06fd

ca45a3556c02.title: Zach —Thank you for sharing your thoughts/feelings in this post.

paragraphs.text: Thank you for sharing this beautiful writing with the world.I know this must have been very difficult to pen down,and I would like to commend you for doing this. Its heartening to see such deep friendships still exist in today’s world. Take care. Peace.

32812ee1770c.title: Thank you for sharing this beautiful writing with the world.I

paragraphs.text: I have tried to write a note to you Zach, but everything just comes out like a bunch of BS. Sorry. You did a wonderful job in honoring your best friend. A death that feels like it has come too soon just inspires anger in me. I rail at the person responsible. I find myself mentally locking and loading on my way to go and stop things like this from…
paragraphs.name: 27de

df6651cdc207.title: I have tried to write a note to you Zach, but everything just comes out like a bunch of BS.

paragraphs.text: Definitely not an 8 minute read. Cried way too many times in between. Thank you so much for sharing.
paragraphs.name: 64c6

virtuals.subtitle: Gun free zones are only gun free until a mad man or woman decides to kill innocent unarmed people.

paragraphs.text: I am sorry for your loss. I am sorry that this is just another example of how our government disarming law abiding citizens creates situations like this where evil people know they can go and no one can shoot back.
Gun free zones are only gun free until a mad man or woman decides to kill innocent unarmed people.
paragraphs.name: ec0f

f29522c6637c.title: I am sorry for your loss.

content.subtitle: Gun free zones are only gun free until a mad man or woman decides to kill innocent unarmed people.

paragraphs.text: This was a wonderful tribute to your friend. It reminds me that most of ‘us’ move on, while those who lost friends and family remain always attached. Your love for your friend sounds as if he were still sitting next to you, enjoying each other’s company — that is the best tribute.
paragraphs.name: 70be

42fe3a2ae889.title: This was a wonderful tribute to your friend.

paragraphs.text: This resonates so much with me. We have different stories but seemingly similar ways of processing, and writing about, grief. I’m keeping, “Memory makes choices as haphazardly as fate does…” in my back pocket. Thank you lending me this gem, and for sharing your story.
paragraphs.name: 349e

3b8abc726e9f.title: This resonates so much with me.

paragraphs.text: “Memory makes choices as haphazardly as fate does…”
paragraphs.name: 8d2d

4b5f3ab08d51.title: “Memory makes choices as haphazardly as fate does…”

paragraphs.text: Thank you for sharing. Grief is hard. Living after someone you love and care for dies is hard. I’m not sure if the pain ever really goes away , when death happens. But it is good to know you had some time with the one who leaves you behind. Live, love , and laugh…always remembering you laughed loved and lived with your friend for some precious time. In peace. God bless you.
paragraphs.name: 5ad4

virtuals.subtitle: Not much else to say, except my heart goes out to you.

paragraphs.text: I am so so sorry about your friend. My niece was in her last year at Tech, 10 years ago, and also lost a friend in that horrible tragedy.
paragraphs.name: c4da

paragraphs.text: Not much else to say, except my heart goes out to you.
paragraphs.name: 2ce7

d0d57a1b4093.title: I am so so sorry about your friend.

content.subtitle: Not much else to say, except my heart goes out to you.

paragraphs.text: I broke down while reading your tribute to your friend. This was so senseless and I remember the news vividly that day. So sorry for your loss but how lucky you were to have known him. Keep doing good in his honor…
paragraphs.name: bfd2

a0e039c524a6.title: I broke down while reading your tribute to your friend.

paragraphs.text: I can’t tell you how much this hit me in the gut. This was beautifully written, I’m sorry for your loss. Words aren’t enough.
paragraphs.name: bc2e

4235b2a84fc5.title: I can’t tell you how much this hit me in the gut.

paragraphs.text: Wow this was beautifully written. I teared up through the whole piece. It was a beautiful and honouring piece.
This has moved me in sooooo many ways. Thank you and may Hanh rest in peace, in a better place, surrounded by love,kind thoughts, and comfort.
paragraphs.name: ca18

a5182b7f6a99.title: This has moved me in sooooo many ways.

paragraphs.text: This is a beautiful way to remember your friend, not to mention very well written. My condolences to you.

virtuals.subtitle: I hate those words. They don’t say nearly enough. But they’re really all you can say. The immensity of the loss of a loved one is too big…

paragraphs.text: I’m sorry for your loss.
paragraphs.name: 35ad

paragraphs.text: I hate those words. They don’t say nearly enough. But they’re really all you can say. The immensity of the loss of a loved one is too big for words. Thank you for putting your grief into words.
paragraphs.name: dd10

paragraphs.text: “How to not have to write a eulogy.”

content.subtitle: I hate those words. They don’t say nearly enough. But they’re really all you can say. The immensity of the loss of a loved one is too big…

paragraphs.text: Very powerful writing. Very sad. As you pointed out no words.
paragraphs.name: 15db

2d07e6fcf842.title: Very powerful writing. Very sad. As you pointed out no words.

paragraphs.text: your friend and our fellow human being was taken from this earth for reasons no one really knows, probably not even the killer. what i can assure you is that as long as he is in yours and others that knew him, memories , he still lives and will continue doing good by the inspiration that your memory of him helps you spread.
paragraphs.name: 6a9a

64ad67d1108c.title: your friend and our fellow human being was taken from this earth for reasons no one really knows…

virtuals.subtitle: Don’t let evil win. Fight it with all the kindness your soul can find.

paragraphs.text: So sory for the loss of Henh. While his family and friends suffer the greatest loss, the world loses also. We lose the magic that would have radiated from his soul and lifted us all above what we are to what we might have been if Henh were still here.
Don’t let evil win. Fight it with all the kindness your soul can find.
paragraphs.name: eafd

80b070bf6f5b.title: So sory for the loss of Henh.

content.subtitle: Don’t let evil win. Fight it with all the kindness your soul can find.

virtuals.subtitle: Reading your story, it breaks again. Be well.

paragraphs.text: I visited Virginia Tech shortly before the shooting. I am from Europe. It was quite a thing to be in the audience in a gym hall, as I only knew from tv, watching the ceremony, the students receiving their diplomas, all dressed up, again, as I only knew from movies and tv shows. We were officially invited — what an honor. The joy I witnessed, the…
paragraphs.name: 88de

effce66e35cd.title: I visited Virginia Tech shortly before the shooting.

content.subtitle: Reading your story, it breaks again. Be well.

paragraphs.text: A sad post. It’s good that you were able to get this out there. Hope you keep writing.
paragraphs.name: 6d1c

1434a8306f79.title: A sad post. It’s good that you were able to get this out there. Hope you keep writing.

paragraphs.text: This is well written, just saying what happened instead of trying to describe how it felt. Sorry you lost your friend like that.
